executable.title: BRAINS Surface Flattening
executable.description: This program flattens the genus zero cortical surface onto a sphere.
executable.contributor: Wen Li and Arnaud Gelas and Vincent Magnotta
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this work was provided by NIH/NINDS award NS050568

double.name: sphereRadius
double.description: The radius of the output sphere
double.label: Sphere Radius

boolean.name: seed
boolean.description: Specify axis along which seed cells are chosen
boolean.label: seed

string-enumeration.name: seedAxis
string-enumeration.description: Specify the seed axis as in Cartesian Coordinate System
string-enumeration.label: seed axis

boolean.name: rotate
boolean.description: rotate the sphere to align polar point
boolean.label: rotate the sphere

string-enumeration.name: maxAxis
string-enumeration.description: the polar point along this axis stays to be the polar point on the sphere
string-enumeration.label: max axis
